version_description:
-Two new Trap levels (25 traps)!
-Configure your point of view and point of impact.
-Even more accurate simulation of disciplines.

Thanks for everyone who bought the game! Thanks for everyone who has participated on live events, gave feed back or other ways supported the game community! And of course Apple for featuring the game! This all makes it possible for me to continue working with the game.

-Two new Trap levels (25 traps)!
-Configure your point of view and point of impact.
-Even more accurate simulation of disciplines.

Thanks for everyone who bought the game! Thanks for everyone who has participated on live events, gave feed back or other ways supported the game community! And of course Apple for featuring the game! This all makes it possible for me to continue working with the game.

-Two new Trap levels (25 traps)!
-Configure your point of view and point of impact.
-Even more accurate simulation of disciplines.

Thanks for everyone who bought the game! Thanks for everyone who has participated on live events, gave feed back or other ways supported the game community! And of course Apple for featuring the game! This all makes it possible for me to continue working with the game.

-Significant improvements to the performance. Game should now run smoothly on more devices!
-Toggle whether you like to see the hit location after rounds

-Significant improvements to the performance. Game should now run smoothly on more devices!
-Toggle whether you like to see the hit location after rounds

-Significant improvements to the performance. Game should now run smoothly on more devices!
-Toggle whether you like to see the hit location after rounds

* Fixed the issue where some devices, the game froze for few seconds regularly.
* Fixed the Point Of Impact to affect as it should be (please make sure the gun is configured as you prefer after updating to this version)
* Further optimisation to make the game smooth on even more devices!

* Fixed the issue where some devices, the game froze for few seconds regularly.
* Fixed the Point Of Impact to affect as it should be (please make sure the gun is configured as you prefer after updating to this version)
* Further optimisation to make the game smooth on even more devices!

* Fixed the issue where some devices, the game froze for few seconds regularly.
* Fixed the Point Of Impact to affect as it should be (please make sure the gun is configured as you prefer after updating to this version)
* Further optimisation to make the game smooth on even more devices!

* Fixed the hit visualisation in the double trap game mode
* Fixed an general issue with hit visualisation where sometimes hit was shown under when it was over (and vice versa)

* Fixed the hit visualisation in the double trap game mode
* Fixed an general issue with hit visualisation where sometimes hit was shown under when it was over (and vice versa)

* Fixed the hit visualisation in the double trap game mode
* Fixed an general issue with hit visualisation where sometimes hit was shown under when it was over (and vice versa)
Fixed the bug which caused clay pigeons colliding with each other on beginner and intermediate difficulties.
Fixed the bug which caused clay pigeons colliding with each other on beginner and intermediate difficulties.
Fixed the bug which caused clay pigeons colliding with each other on beginner and intermediate difficulties.
Long awaited Sporting Clays mode is finally added to the game! Sporting Clays is "like golf with a shotgun": Lot of variation, exiting new target types and of course fun!
Long awaited Sporting Clays mode is finally added to the game! Sporting Clays is "like golf with a shotgun": Lot of variation, exiting new target types and of course fun!
Long awaited Sporting Clays mode is finally added to the game! Sporting Clays is "like golf with a shotgun": Lot of variation, exiting new target types and of course fun!

-Practise individual targets and pairs with the added practise mode!
-Challenge your self with the new Sporting Clays course!
-Hit feedback recognition redesigned to provide more accurate results.
-Lots of bugs fixes.

It's hunting season: Duck Hunt added! Check out also the improved pigeon hunt.

The update also contains important bug fixes for the live event.

-Configure your gun just right for the discipline! Switch between ribs, chokes and modify the point of view and impact.
-Double Trap station switching fixed
-iPhone X now supported
